about_the_game:
Instead of controlling just one measly unit, you get to be the big boss in charge of a whole army. And it's all happening in real-time. Your army units will be flocking together, following your every move. You can direct them to attack, move or even run to avoid the enemy's attacks. It's like having your own personal army at your fingertips.




Who says war has to be deadly serious? Defeating your opponent's army units means they switch teams and join your ranks. No need for any casualties here! Your goal is to dominate the battlefield by taking out all other opponents.




So, even though Guilds n Glory is all about fighting and battles in a medieval world, there's something pretty adorable about it. The characters move, attack, and even scream in a cute way. And even when they get hurt, they're still cute.




Each guild has a unique normal attack that requires a different strategy to win. But wait, there's more! The special attack is a game-changer. Use it wisely and you can turn the tide of the battle in your favour.




Activate tactical formations in real-time. Timing and strategy are crucial as you turn your army formation on or off to gain the upper hand on the battlefield.




You've got the Knights, Archers, Assassins, Barbarians, Priests, and Guilds. Each one is pretty adorable in its own way, but they all require a different strategy to play.



Our game is currently in the works and we're putting in some serious elbow grease to make it awesome for you. Don't be a stranger and follow us to keep tabs on all the latest and greatest developments.

short_description: Guilds n Glory is a cute medieval-inspired arcade-style hack-and-slash multiplayer mayhem that lets you command an entire army instead of a single character, and the only thing more satisfying than a crushing victory is seeing your enemies join your army - no one truly dies, they just switch sides!
